what: Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
title: Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
text: function determines whether provided year leap year based rules Gregorian calendar.

title: Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
text: year numeric numeric-string scalar input representing year.

title: Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
Check if a given year is a leap year — is_leapyear
code: is_leapyear(2000) # TRUE #> [1] TRUE is_leapyear("1992") # TRUE #> [1] TRUE is_leapyear("1900") # FALSE #> [1] FALSE
